reviewDetails.comment: He is a very knowledgeable doctor with ton of experience. We couldn't be happier with him being our son's and daughter's doctor.
He’s great with my little one. Always available when I need him and ready to answer any questions

Dr Baydar has been seeing our son since the very first day of his life until now, 3 yrs, and he has always shown genuine concern for him. Super knowledgeable & always returns calls. Our son LOVES seeing his Dr & even thanks him when he gets an immunization. He takes the time to interact with the children to make them feel at ease. Highly recommended.
Dr Baydar is amazing. He has years of experience plus he's very friendly. My daughter always had a good experience at Dr Baydar's office.

Yes!
Dr.Baydayr is a very good and friendly with kids!
My son is with him since He was born in January 2009.I do not have to wait in the office, and all the office members are helpful and kind people all the time!

Dr. Baydar is a great Doctor, very well knowledgeable and experienced for years. He loves kids and  helpful  and reachable whenever we need.  
Our little son is in good hand, we have been feeling,.
Dr. Tung is the best ever! All docs are amazing
